attributes.action: consider the required response/actions of epetitions more thoroughly and stop avoiding any action!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After reading the government responses to many of these petitions it is clear they are about as much good as if they had not been signed in the first place.  The responses are full of excuses and flowery words which amount to the same attitude - we do not care and are not willing to take action.  

Please look into actioning the issues that law abiding have taken time to bring to your attention. Each response so far has amounted to nothing but let downs which in turn lessens everyones trust, respect and faith in the petitions system.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
